reviews.review: CrashReportClient
真的挂多，玩个夹子鬼那人就在我眼前晃来晃去，而且怎么都追不到人，，一直跟着我，我就只好把网线拔了

I have an i7 computer but this game crashes all the time i was waiting for an update but nothing. I reported multiple crashed but didn't get an answer. The game is loading hard you wait to much to start the game and somethink it hangs for a while.
I can't play this game.

Bought the game. CAN'T play with friends it is considered "Cheating" so CO-OP is a false claim. also as of 7/08/16 you CAN't change ANY keys. My son and I both filed for a refund from steam. it was granted the next day. Fun concept don't call it Co-op if it is random strangers. You should also be clear and UPFRONT you are forcing people paying you money to use the keys YOU Choose to hard program in the game.

It has the potential to be a really good game, but as of right now I would not recommend that anyone spend money on it. Maybe if/when apects of the game get tweaked/balenced it will be more fun but as of right now its more annoying than anything else. This game also does not really enourage a lot of cooperation, or of playing with your friends. Sure, if you have a group you can play together but when you and a buddy want to try and survive together forget it. The game won't allow you to make a party and join an open lobby. I'm sure some people may find this game enjoyable and won't agree with me but I have to say that I would not recommend this game to anyone.

В 3 раз меняю своё мнение,надеюсь в последний раз, захожу такой неделю назад поиграть просто так знаю что будет 40 кадров на минималках, захожу о чудо появилась оптимизация,я чуть не заплакал, теперь у меня на высоких 60 кадров ничего не падает не лагает, я даже ради этой игры готов покупать платный контент, потому что интерес появляется,разработчики ДБД потеряли тысячи игроков из-за плохого отношения к комьюнити,зато когда выходит Friday 13th, они добавляют оптимизацию и много годных плюшек для комьюнити, браво , НО ПОЧЕМУ СПУСТЯ ГОД?

Pretty good job so far.

Moinsen zusammen.

Ich habe jetzt Dead by Daylight über 40 Stunden gespielt und werde es sicherlich auch noch mehr als das spielen. Im großen und ganzen ist das Spiel sehr unbalanced. Dabei ist hier das Wort unbalanced mit Vorsicht zu genießen, denn die meisten, die das sagen, sind irgendwelche Rang 20 Scrubs, die generell gar keine Ahnung von irgendwelchen Mechaniken haben, die das Spiel vorallem für die Killer bietet. Aber ja, das Spiel ist trotz alle dem wirklich gut. Es macht Spaß, einige Runden sind mit Spannung geladen, bei einigen Runden fässt man sich einfach nur an den Kopf. Eine perfekte Mischung meines Empfindens und derzeit mein Favorit aus dem Jahr 2016. 

Nun, während des ganzen Spielens sind mir viele Dinge aufgefallen, die trotz alle dem noch gefixed werden müssen. 

Survivor: 
- ich lagge. Warum auch immer, mein Ping ist konstant gut, ich dürfte mich eigentlich nicht durch die Welt teleportieren. Das hat mir in so vielen Situationen einen Pip und die ganze Runde versaut.
-  bei dem selbstständigen Befreien vom Haken kommt manchmal die Erfolgsanimation, man hängt allerdings immer noch dran.
- nachdem ich eine Kiste geöffnet und gelooted habe werde ich einige Meter wegteleportiert

Kiler:
- die Leuten buggen wie ein Stadtfest auf der Schulter rum und man sieht nichts
- ich hebe jemanden vor dem Fenster auf und stehe auf einmal hinter dem Fenster
- die Animation des Aufhängens kommt und der Typ rennt einfach weg (hier bin ich mir nicht sicher, ob es sich doch um einen Hack handeln könnte)
- jemand ist vor einem umgeschmissenen Holzblock. Man will ihn schlagen, der Killer hat allerdings mehr Bock dat Holz zu zerkloppen.
- ich kann einfach den Survivor nicht aufheben
- ich kletter durch ein Fenster und werde wieder dahinter gebuggt
- ich kann den Survivor nicht von der Barrikade ziehen oder ihn schlagen, er trifft das Holz
- generell die ganzen Hitboxen der Survivor (manchmal trifft man, wenn man nicht hätte treffen sollen, und wenn man direkt hinter dem Survivor steht und 100% hätte treffen sollen, trifft er nicht)

Vorschläge für das Game:
- einen non-ranked Modus einführen (damit man einen anderen Killer ausprobieren kann, der noch keine guten Perks hat. Vorallem wenn man in höheren Rängen spielt ist das wichtig)
- einen "Survive with your friends"-Modus (Ja, das soll kommen, aber pleeeease, baut es ein)
Good l love it

This game can provide hours of fun and the way they have everything set up is very cool but it upsets me theres no multiplayer for survivors yet if you want to play with your friends besides having to kill them

중소기업 생산직 근로자의 애환을 느낄 수 있는 게임 "주간근무에 의한 죽음"입니다.

여러분의 목적은 발전기 정비업체의 생산직 근로자가 되어 할당받은 발전기 5대를 가동하고 퇴근하는 것입니다.

극심한 취업난 속에 유명 만화가, 달리기 선수, 생물학 전공 엘리트조차 생산직으로 일할 수밖에 없는 현실을 잘 반영한 게임이라고 할 수 있습니다.

만약 정비를 실수하거나 불만을 품고 기물파손을 시도한다면 이를 보고받은 싸이코 작업반장한테서 온갖 갈굼에 시달려야 합니다.
그리고 기업 대표 "Entity"와 면담하러 간 동료들은 아마 다시 볼 수 없을 겁니다.

비록 동료직원들이 모두 잡혀갔다 해도 너무 절망할 것 없습니다.
회사 어딘가에 몰래 뚫어놓은 개구멍을 통해 조기퇴근을 시도할 수 있거든요.

하지만 "최저 시급 1만 원"을 달성하지 못한다면 여러분의 삶은 밑바닥 20랭크를 벗어나지 못합니다.

방법이 없는 것은 아닙니다. 작업량을 모두 채웠다 해도 추가 잔업을 통해 수당을 더 받으면 되니까요. 비록 이 회사가 작고 열악하긴 해도 일한 만큼의 수당은 꼬박꼬박 챙겨줍니다.

대신 칼퇴근을 하지 못해 열 받은 작업반장은 눈에 불을 켜고 작업자들을 찾아다닐 것이며 발각된다면 무시무시한 고문을 피할 수 없을 겁니다.

그렇다 해도 경력자만 채용하는 현 세태에서 신입을 받아주는 회사라는 게 어딥니까.
(미칠듯한 심장 소리와 뻥튀기의 압박을 견디지 못한 신입사원들은 조기 퇴사해버리지만..) 

오늘도 여러분은 일을 마치고 무사히 퇴근할 수 있을까요???
Игра крутая.В ней много атмосферности и экшена.

Kill your friends.
虽然很推荐这款游戏，但是，真的很希望官方能把自家的服务器处理好，实在很恼火有时！

恐怖游戏应该属于是游戏界一块圣土，而生存游戏应该属于游戏界的一个新星，而今天我们要介绍的这款《黎明杀机》就属于恐怖和生存兼备的游戏，并且这款游戏还有着十足的乐趣。
   虽然这不是什么超级开发商制作，但是我们从游戏中看到了数不胜数的优点，所谓细节决定成败，在这款游戏中这句话被演绎的淋漓尽致，一些老套的恐怖元素不再单单以“转角遇到爱”的形式出现，而传统的生存元素也不是口渴，饥饿或是冷暖而已。这些颠覆传统的改变，深得了玩家的喜欢，而人类与屠夫的对决也让玩家感受到了《猫和老鼠》的乐趣，不过是惊悚版的。
 一、玩法
   说道本作的一大优点，当然是本作设定的新奇玩法，每局游戏共5人，一人屠夫，四人为人类，其目的就是很简单，人类必须通过开发电机从而开门逃跑，而屠夫则是屠杀人类，咋眼一看的游戏玩法类似于《进化》，但是如果把这款作品和《进化》相比，显然是在侮辱本作，游戏中的人类不能对屠夫进行有效的杀伤，手中的道具和场景中提供的物品仅仅就是能够拖延屠夫行动的时间而已。不得不承认，这种设定就完美避免了大部分像《进化》出现的问题，人类追着屠夫杀的情况，即便如此的保护屠夫，但我们还是会在游戏中出现屠夫被人耍的情况，但不可否认的是这种氛围已经做到很好了，起码不会像《进化》那样，玩家都不愿意选怪物。
   游戏场景中玩家需要打开发电机的数量是当前人类数量加一个，当然正常情况下如果队伍中4个人类，那么就需要开启5个发电机，场景中还分布许许多多的钩子，用来辅助屠夫来挂住人类。并且如果人类只剩下一人时，会有一个地下通道打开，当然玩家需要自行寻找。这种激动紧张的玩法，绝对是本作引人的一大利器。
如果在开发电机过程中发生爆炸，那酸爽只可意会不可言传
   二、紧张和欢乐的氛围营造
   本作又一个特色就是对氛围的营造，所谓氛围，不单单是场景阴暗的设置，更多的是玩家心理上的紧张，才能产生更加强烈的代入感，而一款恐怖类游戏，想要做到这一点除了紧张的压迫感以外，更重要的是玩家对敌人的认知，例如满分神作《美国末日》的氛围就营造的不错，它的成功在很大程度上是游戏难度决定的，玩家不能轻易的触发僵尸的警觉，否则在弹药不足的情况下后患无穷，如果把僵尸设定像《真三国无双》那样像纸片一样的话，相信无论环境如何阴暗，BOSS如何变态，紧张的氛围均不会存在太久。
   显然本作做到了，并且做的还是相当的不错，由于本作的屠夫是真实玩家所控制，这一点就很大程度上提高了人类玩家的心里压迫感，毕竟再聪明的AI也不能有真实玩家的思想。这种感觉就像《求生之路》的多人对战一样，你不能再用传统的方式对付不会躲子弹的坦克，因为他们都是玩家所控。
各种屠夫有着各种不同的技能，所以有着很多样的玩法
   本作的屠夫有3种，一种是使用电锯的屠夫，一种是可以使用陷阱的屠夫，一种是可以会隐身的屠夫每一种屠夫都有着自己的独特能力，电锯的屠夫使用电锯时可以直线冲刺，并且电锯一击就可以让人类倒地，陷阱屠夫可以在地上放置夹子，可以夹住人类，而隐身屠夫则可以隐身，但隐身时不能攻击。当电锯屠夫拿出电锯时，这种电锯发出的声音伴随着紧张的氛围真的是让人不寒而栗，而隐身屠夫现型时的铃声提示，更是让玩家紧张的不行，作为人类玩家，这种刺激而紧张的感觉做的真的是很到位。并且屠夫靠近人类一定范围时，人类玩家会听见心跳，而一款恐怖生存游戏，越来越近的心跳声带来的感觉谁玩谁知道。
   当然，如果玩家选择屠夫，则没有了所谓的恐怖氛围，因为自己就是全游戏中最吓人的角色，反而很多玩屠夫的玩家都非常的欢乐，选择电锯屠夫的玩家时不时拿出电锯恐吓他人，而隐身屠夫就更是欢乐，如果不着急杀人，每次现行的时候都会惹的玩家像无头苍蝇一般的乱串，而陷阱屠夫最大的欢乐之处就是将人类驱赶到自己陷阱的地方，被捉住从而进行击杀。这种紧张和欢乐并存的游戏，实属难得。
正因为是玩家控制，所以屠夫往往是很有战术的
   三、结语
   在恐怖游戏慢慢远离人们视线的今天，我们难得看到了这样一款以氛围主打的恐怖类生存游戏，尽管恐怖鼻祖级游戏《生化危机7》在E3亮相，但是我们明显能够感觉，恐怖游戏早就不复当年之勇，但喜欢这种类型游戏的玩家着实不在少数，我们通过本作看到了传统恐怖元素的出现，也看到了许许多多新颖的设定，现在的恐怖游戏不是设定几个吓人恶心的BOSS就能引起玩家的共鸣，在这方面本作做的也算是相当不错了。
恐怖游戏渐行渐远的今天，本作在很多方面把握的还是相当的不错
   紧张的氛围，全面而新颖的细节设计，都将这款游戏带到了一个新的高度。即便还有很多缺陷，即便20级别的萌新屠夫看见1级人皇还是会吓得退出游戏，即便在游戏中屠夫被耍的怒砸键盘，但是我们都看到了本作的新颖设计，更值得一提的是，这些设计，还是非常讨喜的。如果细细打磨，也许游戏会精致很多。
   总分：8分
   优点：环境设计很讨喜 ，技能树和职业设计很到位，氛围营造很燃，职业选择多样
   缺点：匹配机制不完善，退出游戏惩罚机制不完善，人物动作不够细腻
   召集令：恐怖游戏爱好者，生存游戏爱好者，惊悚游戏爱好者，FPS爱好者。
   免战牌：画面党，剧情党，惧怕恐怖元素的玩家。

Bu incelemem oyun ilk çıktığındaydı şimdi devamını getiriyorum 
Eğer bu incelememe değer verip okuyorsanız beni çok mutlu etmiş olursunuz bildiğiniz üzere hayırlısıyla 1.1.0 yamasına giriş yaptık ancak birçok kişi yeni gelen killer hakkın karşı durulamaz biri olduğuna inanıyor ben öyle düşünmüyorum eğer karşınızda The Nurse varsa saklanarak oynamanız size daha yararlı olur teleport özelliğini kullanacağından dolayı sizi gözden kaçırması kolaylaşır diğer bir taktik ise kişinin teleport olacağı yerin tam tersine gidebilmek bu biraz zor eğer çabuk yapılmazsa killer arkadaşımız bunu çözüyor bence hiçbir killer karşı konulamaz değil The Nurse bile hem Dead byDaylight'ın paylaştığı verilere göre geçen 12 saat içerisinde en çok oynanan killerın Trapper olduğu açıklandı 2. olarak Hilly Billy 3. olarak ise The Nurse oda yeni olduğundan dolayıdır yani The Nurse öldünüz diye rage atıp bu kadar oyuna emek veren insana hakaret edip birdaha oyuna girmemektense insanlar zaten The Nurse'den şimdiden sıkılmaya başladı ki bencede diğer katiller daha eğlenceli herneyse çok uzattım galiba buraya kadar okuduysanız cidden benim yazdıklarıma değer veriyorsunuz demektir buda beni çok mutlu yapar söylediklerimi göz önünde bulundurun iyi oyunlar dilerim The Nurse'e dikkat edin testereyi arkanızda hissetmeyin :) esen kalın görüşmek üzere

Eigentlich ein super nSpiel das echt Laune macht aber:

-Viel zu viele Bugs und Laggs um die sich viel zu wenig gekümmert wird
-Wenig, bis kein Support: Bei Fragen soll man sich in Steam ans Forum wenden: Bekommt da aber so gut wie von jmnd, geschweige denn von einem Entwickler-Teammitglied ne Antwort.

Bis eben konnte ich das Spiel garnicht mehr spielen, da sich mein PC immer verabschiedet hat, wenn ich das Spiel gestartet habe. Problem wurde mittlerweile, nach einer sehr ärgerlichen Mail an den Entwickler, behoben.

Wie gesagt: Ich spiele dieses Spiel gerne, es macht echt Laune... Kann es aber nur bedingt empfehlen, wenn man sich nicht mit solch ätzenden Problemen herumschlagen will, die einem echt Zeit kosten können!

Aber wenn man Spaß an solchen Spielen hat, wie ich zumindest, ist ein echt verdammt guter Titel, den man sich geben sollte. 

Für alle die jetzt zögern: Beim nächsten Sale zuschlagen! 

Spiel 9/10
Umsetzung 7/10
Support 2/10

£14.99 and It's worth every penny. If you can get it on sale you'd be crazy not to get it. When yopu think how much time go's into making a game it's not a lot. It's a really fun game and being a survivor is just as fun as being a killer. If your a survivor you have to get generators up and running to open the gates to escape from the level and if your a killer you need to stop them. There's more generators then needed on the map to power up the two gates that then can be opened to escapse so people can't camp. Yay! Also I feel the game it balanced well and a nice selection of killers with different abilitys.  There's also progression which everyone likes such as perks, consumables and a kinda like talent tree. 

Only con for me is mics have been disabled for some reason. At a guess I'd say 12 year olds screaming down the microphone again. It happens in a lot of games and mics get disabled which is a shame but with a game like this where you need to play as a team I really think it needs to be put back on with a way to mute players if we choose to.

Dead by Daylight ist ein Spiel, in dem vier junge Menschen durch das Aktivieren von Generatoren ein Ausgangstor öffnen müssen, um aus einem abgesperrten Areal entkommen zu können. Doch ein Killer streift ebenfalls durch die Lande und dieser möchte bloß seine Opfer an dem nächsten Hacken baumeln sehen.

Dead by Daylight hat (derzeit) zwei Spielmodi: Das Spielen mit bis zu 5 Freunden in einer Offline-Loby oder das Online-Spiel, welches von einem Spieler, der die Rolle des Killers übernimmt, gehostet wird und vier zufälligen Spielern, die dem Spiel als Opfer joinen.
Beide Modi machen auf Dauer richtig Spaß und treiben den Herzschlag so richtig an! :)
Auch, wenn es in Online-Spielen keine Kommunikationsmöglichkeiten mit anderen Spielern gibt, ist es doch immer wieder erstaunlich, wie man es trotzdem schafft, sich irgendie zu verständigen. Daher finde ich, braucht das Spiel auch keine Möglichkeit per Voicechat oder ähnlichem zu reden, da es so die Spannung deutlich erhöht, wenn man eventuelle Reaktionen der Mitspieler nur annähernd deuten kann.
Das Spielen mit Freunden macht ebenfalls richtig viel Spaß, trotz der Tatsache, dass es in diesem Spielmodus keine Blutpunkte gibt, die ein Charakter zum Leveln und Freischalten neuer Fähigkeiten benötigt. Und auch, wenn diese Spiele eher auf Spaß und weniger auf Spannung wie bei den Online-Spielen ausgelegt sind, kommt auch hier das Nervenflattern selten zu kurz. :) 

Derzeit gibt es drei verschiedene Killer und vier unterschiedliche Überlebende, die allesamt eigene Fähigkeiten und Vorteile haben, die auf den 3 unterschiedlichen Grundstücken (die es jeweils in vier verschiedenen, prozedual generierten Versionen gibt) sich als nützlich erweisen können.
Es wurde aber bereits von den Entwicklern angekündigt, dass bald noch neuer Content folgen wird.

Auch, wenn es derzeit noch etliche Bugs gibt, die teilweise die Spielfreude etwas dämpfen, würde ich das Spiel auch zurzeit schon empfehlen, da es großes Protential birgt und einfach jetzt schon richtig Spaß macht! :)

This is a serious review from a long time player of dead by daylight. I've seen the game in worse condition than anyone else has. I know every bug that once festered in this game and have seen how the game has developed since it released. I believe my opinion should be a good influence to those on the edge about purchasing this game. without further ado, here's my take on the game.

The current state of this game is unplayable for survivors. Don't attempt to play as survivor. Developers have their heads up their gaping butt sphincter, (remember, this is serious.) and do not take feedback of any kind. They most likely will fix many issues, as they always have, but if you intend to play with friends this is definitely the wrong game for you until further notice. Playing against a new player as a killer versus a veteran high ranked player you will find a very challenging match no matter what perk you attempt.

However, if you intend to play killer, thankfully they've increased your reach on hit, so you should be able to get beyond rank 20 very effortlessly. I've been sitting steadily on rank 1 (the top rank) quite comfortably since the update. This will be a lot of fun for you, like myself.

The new interface took some time to get used to, but it's not bad, just make sure to reduce the scale to 70% immediately. playing 100% scale just makes everything feel worse.

I'll update this review when things have changed, but it's unlikely for at least a couple of months. There's a ton of issues with perks, hit scan, and movement that make the game unbalanced. It's quite unfortunate that the game was so playable until a day ago. Rollbacks aren't this developer's thing which is why I suggest you don't support the company. Again, at their own pace, they will fix these issues and I'm sure it will be better than before, just that I disagree with how the implemented every part of this new update without resolving these issues before hand. For shame.

Camping till Daylight

Hello. This is the first time I've written a review for a steam game, but I've felt pretty scorned by this game once the honeymoon phase had passed.

The first part of the game is very thrilling when everyone is lvl 19 and 20. People make mistakes, people freak out, and it generally plays I think the way the development team had advertised it. There is one powerful killer that stalks his prey until all survivors have been eliminated or have escaped.

In my opinion it should be very rare that survivors escape. Survivors should be able to gain decent rank depending on how well they struggled to the bitter end, but escaping is something they've made far too easy. 

As the game progresses into the lower ranks we find that the survivors have been equiped with so many tools and perks that there is little reason to fear the killer. Very often perks will allow them to easily identify where the killer is and which direction they're coming from with aboslutely no trade-off. Conversely the killer gains perks that mostly assist the killer once a player has been caught or has been damaged. As fun as the perks may be for the killer (like insidious perk for ambushing players), they don't assist with finding the survivors. So when the survivor has spine chill and premonition, you're never going to find a good survivor purely because the perks become their new heartbeat monitor. 

I was lucky enough as a survivor to get spinechill 3 very very early. My win-rate skyrocketed on that perk alone because I could leave the area whilst my teammates had no clue why I was leaving. I knew the killer was looking my way (cloaked or not) and I could prepare to hide far in advance. This immediately kills the fear in beind hunted and just turns it into a little game of watch the spine chill detector; patience will win you most of the games at that point.

The perks for killer that tell you when a survivor is within 32 meters, and the one that allows crows to communicate with you are not terribly effective as a 32 meter radius could waste all your time looking. The crows only seem to tell you when someone is AFK. 

One of the big killers for the game once you go into the lower ranks is window vaulting exploit. There's currently no cooldown on window hopping and most fo the maps are set up to allow survivors to lead the killer on an infinite loop through windows and doors where unless you're the trapper, you can't counter. You can kill all the other survivors then play infinite loop with the last survivor until one of you gets bored. THIS IS TERRIBLE GAME DESIGN. Immersion is lost, and the survivor gets all the power. Players have been known to farm killers for points and have even been know to chase the killer to egg them into following them through an infinite loop. Until this is fixed I play the game less and less. 

I would really like to see most of the survivor perks go away, and really limit the perks for the killer as well. Things like Insidious, Hardended Grip *I think it's called*, and monstrous shrine are passives that only help you if you catch a survivor through a successful chase. I dislike the perks that make you completely OP in a categoy (ie. one hit knockdowns when exit gates are open). 

This game is without a doubt going through an experimental phase. If you want to get yourself frustrated over t-bagging survivors that will stand on the other side of the window and crouchspam and self-heal then by all means come and play, but I think folks are looking for survival horror. Nothing horrifying about cocky survivors- the ball should always be in the killers court or there is no fear.
